explanation: The loop only accepted the case where A[i][j] == 'W' and A[j][i] == 'L' but did not accept the symmetric case where A[i][j] == 'L' and A[j][i] == 'W'. I fixed the single conditional line to allow either (W,L) or (L,W) as valid symmetric outcomes, so valid L/W pairs are no longer treated as contradictions.
